DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the impact of oral rosuvastatin in diabetic polyneuropathy, and the role of lipid peroxidation and nerve growth factor.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Rosuvastatin in Diabetic Polyneuropathy: A Phase IIa Randomized Double-blind Placebo-controlled Study
DOC.criteria: Patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus Glycated hemoglobin <12.0% Signing of informed consent Presence of an abnormality of nerve conduction study Symptoms and signs of diabetic polyneuropathy Pregnancy and lactation Foot ulcers Treatment with statins Antioxidant drug and/or supplements one month previous to enrolment Inability to mobilize Renal and/or hepatic failure
